title: Sailing
brief_description: The pleasures of sailing in smaller craft. Different types of sailing dinghies, yachts and canoes in action; the prowess of enthusiasts enjoying this popular sport at many locations in Britain. Closing sequences show HRH the Duke of Edinburgh at the annual Cowes Regatta.
